# Positive Infinity

> [Double-precision floating-point][ieee754] positive infinity.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var FLOAT64_PINF = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/float64-pinf' );
```

#### FLOAT64_PINF

[Double-precision floating-point][ieee754] positive infinity.

```javascript
var bool = ( FLOAT64_PINF === Infinity );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

<section class="examples">

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

```javascript
var FLOAT64_PINF = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/float64-pinf' );

console.log( FLOAT64_PINF );
// => Infinity
```

</section>
